segments.text: I glance in and everything seems normal at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate with a towel, very methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, what's that sound—oh my god, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the edge like a river.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle and doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar—sneaky kid!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is reaching up, expecting a cookie any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect this kind of adventure in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a quiet garden, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew drying dishes could hide so much drama?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
